channel.description: Hello and welcome on Mortis Dev Blog

item.title: Hello World
item.author: Morti
item.description:
Every good program starts with a lovely Hello World. So this dev blog should also start with it. On the other hand, it is also a chance for me to get to know Hugo and I also want to introduce myself. Two birds with one stone ðŸ¤˜

Introduction

Hi everyone! My real name is Martin, but everyone calls me Morti. I life in the heart of Europe in Austria. I’m a software developer and I earn my bread with it ðŸ˜‹
